name: Lighthouse, Exterior
description: You're standing outside the lighthouse, high atop a spire of stone about a hundred feet above the crashing waves of the ocean and a few hundred from shore. It's really windy here! There's a red door that would let you enter the lighthouse.

features.look: It's tall and white. The light at the top is still working. Little rectangular windows dot the exterior of the tower all the way up to the top.
It's a solid wood door painted red. It would let you enter the lighthouse.
